properties.areaDesc: Wyoming Black Hills; Northern Black Hills
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 2 at 2:05AM MST until January 2 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Rapid City SD
properties.description:
...PERIODS OF ACCUMULATING SNOW THIS MORNING...

.An upper level disturbance will support periods of moderate
upslope snow this morning. The highest amounts are expected from
Four Corners to just southwest of Lead. Much lesser amounts are
expected around Beulah to Aladdin.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6
inches.

* WHERE...In Wyoming, the Wyoming Black Hills. In South Dakota,
the Northern Black Hills.

* WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The snow amounts will be highly terrain
influenced, with the the highest amounts from Four Corners to
just southwest of Lead. Much lesser amounts can be expected
from around Beulah to Aladdin in Wyoming, and from Brownsville
to Nemo in South Dakota.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING
